programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: More than 20 years after an Austin, Texas, musician is found fatally beaten, the wife of a fellow artist says that her husband commited the crime.

programme.title: I Was a Teenage Felon
programme.desc: From stickups to crack dealing and car theft to bank robbery, Ryan uses his natural charms to succeed in a life of crime and becomes a two-time felon by the age of 18.

programme.title: I Was a Teenage Felon
programme.desc: Marcus becomes caught up in the '90s Washington, D.C., crime wave, slinging crack at 13 and stealing cars at 15; the night he shows a friend how to jack a car leaves them both facing life in prison.

programme.title: I Was a Teenage Felon
programme.desc: By 18, Sean becomes New York's No. 1 club drug plug; one year later, he runs an international ecstasy smuggling operation and makes millions.

programme.title: I Was a Teenage Felon
programme.desc: College friends selling bootleg T-shirts create an empire that pulls in thousands of dollars daily until drugs and arrests tear it down.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: FL v. Malarik - The Winn Dixie Murder
programme.desc: When Sherri Malarik is found dead in a Winn-Dixie parking lot, police suspect her husband Greg is involved; but it takes twenty years and the confession of his accomplice and former lover Jennifer Spohn to finally charge him with murder.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: FL v. Larzelere :The Root of Evil
programme.desc: After a masked man shot dentist Norman Larzelere who dies in the arms of his hysterical wife Virginia, police initially suspect a robbery gone wrong; a friend of Virginia's oldest son Jason reveals a twisted plot.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.
